page.title: 19THE MIDWAY SURGERY
page.content: We had a surgery in the{Doctors home in Watford Road in 1953. Our doctor,Dr.Jackman and his wife ran this, but soon there were so many patients that the surgery was not large enough.Then the doctor moved to No.2 Midway.A playroom was converted to a waiting room.In 1961 all was ready for patients.In 1979 there were three doctors working the area{population}was increasing, a baby clinic was set up.Soon this surgery was overcrowded_to work and wait in.Plans for a new surgery were laid. The Doctors had two and a half years to plan a design that was to be unique in Hertfordshire.Others were visited faults noted and the{new Midway {Surgery}was built to their own design.Clinics held are general surgery,well woman,and baby clinic.It is a friendly place with 4 doctors.
